statements: SELECT * FROM StockCount WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM StockCount ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM StockCount WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM StockCount GROUP BY product_name
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_updated FROM StockCount WHERE quantity > 5
SELECT * FROM StockCount ORDER BY quantity DESC, last_updated ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM StockCount WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT barcode_id, product_name, quantity FROM StockCount WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15
SELECT product_name FROM StockCount WHERE barcode_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM StockCount WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM stock_items;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM stock_items ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT count_id, timestamp FROM stock_count WHERE quantity_scanned > 100;
SELECT * FROM stock_items WHERE quantity < 10 AND barcode IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, barcode FROM stock_items WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_items WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, barcode FROM stock_items WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stock_items
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM stock_items WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM stock_count WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM stock_items;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM stock_items WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, barcode FROM stock_items ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, scan_date, scanned_by FROM barcode_scans WHERE scan_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT count_date, total_count FROM stock_count WHERE verified = true;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM stock_items WHERE id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stock_count WHERE verified = TRUE;
SELECT item_name, barcode, quantity FROM stock_items WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT count_date, total_count FROM stock_count WHERE count_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT item_name, scan_date, scanned_by FROM stock_items JOIN barcode_scans ON stock_items.id = barcode_scans.item_id ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, barcode, quantity FROM products WHERE barcode IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM stock_count WHERE scanning_device = 'Handheld Scanner';
SELECT location_name, location_code FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC, id ASC;
SELECT product_name, barcode FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;

SELECT products.product_name, stock_count.stock_quantity, scanners.scanner_name FROM products INNER JOIN stock_count ON products.id = stock_count.product_id INNER JOIN scanners ON stock_count.scanning_device = scanners.scanner_name;
SELECT product_name, quantity, scanning_timestamp FROM products INNER JOIN stock_count ON products.id = stock_count.product_id WHERE stock_quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, barcode, location_name FROM products INNER JOIN stock_count ON products.id = stock_count.product_id INNER JOIN locations ON stock_count.location_code = locations.location_code;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT name, barcode FROM products ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, role FROM workers WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT id, scanned_at FROM stock_count WHERE count < 50;
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name FROM products INNER JOIN stock_count ON products.id = stock_count.product_id WHERE count < 10;
SELECT name, scanned_at FROM products JOIN stock_count ON products.id = stock_count.product_id JOIN scan_logs ON stock_count.id = scan_logs.worker_id WHERE result = 'success';
SELECT name, count(scanned_at) AS scan_count FROM products JOIN stock_count ON products.id = stock_count.product_id GROUP BY name HAVING scan_count > 5;
SELECT name, role FROM workers WHERE role = 'manager' ORDER BY name ASC;
